titleStmt.title: [Here endeth a lytyll treatyse called the booke of curtesye or lytyll Iohn.]
Book of curtesye.

notesStmt.note: Title and imprint from colophon, printer's name and date of publication from STC.
Imperfect; a fragment; proof of two pages printed on one side of sheet bb.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
